releaseNotes:
Hello there! We’ve got an exciting update for you:
· Minor bug fixes and UI improvements

Have comments or suggestions? Don’t hesitate to reach out!
Thank you for choosing ChatOn!
description:
Welcome to the world of AI assistance! Meet ChatOn, your AI chat and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-5, Sonar, Claude Sonnet, and DeepSeek technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive chat AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you’re in the corporate world getting ready for an important presentation or a copywriter looking for a clever turn of phrase, ChatOn can give you the help you need!

Simply type your request or choose from 100+ ready-made prompts, and the AI chat will go through the writing routine for you.

PIC TRANSFORMER
Give your photos a trendy chat AI makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, AI Action Figure Maker, Plushy, or Cyberpunk—and watch the magic happen. Whether you’re looking for an anime style maker, an AI action figure generator, or some other creative effects, Pic Transformer has you covered.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT
With ChatOn, you can get help with any writing project, from emails and speeches to lyrics and poems. Plus, the bot can give you ideas for follow-up questions to keep your AI chat going and delve deeper into any topic.

WEB ANALYZER
Find the most up-to-date info for your questions online. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, this chat AI is here for you.

DOC MASTER
ChatOn will summarize, rewrite, and translate any document for you. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the AI chat will answer them all.

TEXT-TO-IMAGE FEATURE
ChatOn, our chat AI assistant, will help you turn your ideas into images of any size and style.

PHOTO ANALYZER
Upload a pic into the AI chat app, and let the bot handle the rest. Discover what’s shown on a visual or create hashtags for your photo.

MOBILE-WEB SYNC
Sync your mobile app with the web version to effortlessly switch between devices and keep your AI chat flowing.

YOUTUBE PRO
This chat AI app will help you understand the content of any YouTube video in an instant. Just paste the video's URL, and the AI chat bot will summarize, rewrite, translate it, or answer all your questions about its content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER
The AI chat app will correct grammatical, spelling, and punctuation mistakes in your text.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR
Being a smart AI chat companion, ChatOn is here to help you generate posts for your Facebook, X, Instagram, or LinkedIn profiles.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER (OCR)
ChatOn will assist in recognizing text from images, letting you instantly insert it into the AI chat.

TEXT SUMMARIZER
ChatOn, our chat AI app, uses advanced algorithms to identify key information and present it in a digestible format.

VOICE-TO-TEXT FUNCTION
Speak with our chat AI instead of typing!

AI KEYBOARD
Fill your keyboard with the chat AI power and use it in any app! Enhance your writing on the go, generate text directly from your device, and get perfect responses to messages with ChatOn’s smart keyboard!

RESUME AND COVER LETTER BUILDER
With this chat AI app, you can create a professional resume and cover letter that will showcase your skills, experience, and achievements.

EMAIL GENERATOR
Creating sales, announcement, or discount emails is easier than ever in this AI chat! With ChatOn, you can craft professional and compelling messages in seconds.

As you see, ChatOn is a smart chat AI assistant built on GPT-5 and GPT-4 that can help you with any task. It’s perfect for anyone who strives to boost their writing and speed up their workflow.

Download the ChatOn app now and take your writing to the next level!

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to all app’s features.
- Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://aiby.mobi/chat_ios/privacy
https://aiby.mobi/chat_ios/terms
